Class.name: IFileHashComputer
Class.summary: Interface defining a contract for computing hash values for files asynchronously.

Instance.name: ComputeHashAsync[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Computes the hash value for the specified file asynchronously.
Instance.param: The path of the file for which to compute the hash.
Instance.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result is the computed hash value.
